prompts: Create a small, bipedal Pokemon with a gray and white color scheme and fierce-looking eyes.
Imagine a fighting-type Pokemon that has a strong build and is known for its agility and speed.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies determination, with a unique fur pattern of gray and white.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats, showcasing a balance of strength and finesse.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves into a more powerful form, starting as a basic fighter with unique traits.
Make a rare fighting-type Pokemon that is often found in forested areas and possesses a unique battle style.
Give me a bipedal Pokemon that stands out with its distinctive white mane and expressive facial features.
